data.question: What is the main focus of the research article?
data.answer: Ambient-Temperature Hydrogen Storage via Vanadium(II)-Dihydrogen Complexation in a Metal–Organic Framework

data.question: What method is used for low-pressure hydrogen adsorption measurements?
data.answer: Volumetric method with a Micromeritics ASAP2020 or Micromeritics 3Flex gas sorption analyzer.

data.question: What is the Langmuir surface area of V2Cl2.8(btdd) determined from the 77 K N2 isotherm?
What is the enthalpy of H2 adsorption in V2Cl2.8(btdd) as determined from the study?
Is the BET surface area of V2Cl2.8(btdd) greater than 1900 m2/g?
Does the research involve the use of a metal-organic framework for hydrogen storage?
What is the role of exposed vanadium sites in the metal-organic framework according to the research?
What technique was used to confirm vanadium-H2 bonding in V2Cl2.8(btdd)?
Was the hydrogen storage capacity of V2Cl2.8(btdd) compared to compressed hydrogen under the same conditions?
What is the significance of the Kubas-type interaction in the context of the research?
data.answer: It results in a binding enthalpy of -21 kJ/mol, within the optimal range for ambient hydrogen storage applications.

data.question: What computational method was employed to understand the orbital interactions involved in dihydrogen complexation?
Is the BET surface area of V2Cl2.8(btdd) less than 2000 m2/g?
What was the method used for high-pressure hydrogen isotherms?
data.answer: Measurements were conducted using a Particulate Systems HPVA II-200 with H2 pressures ranging from ~1 bar to 150 bar.

data.question: Did the study find that V2Cl2.8(btdd) has a potential for low-pressure H2 storage applications?
What was the main contribution to charge transfer in the cluster model according to the electronic structure calculations?
data.answer: The interaction between the H2 σ orbital and vanadium dπ orbital.

data.question: Was the synthesis of V2Cl2.8(btdd) described in detail within the supporting information?
What was the role of the Kubas-type interaction in hydrogen storage?
data.answer: It enabled usable hydrogen capacities that exceed that of compressed storage under the same operating conditions.

data.question: What was the average entropy of H2 adsorption across the loading in V2Cl2.8(btdd)?
Did the study involve the use of synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction for analysis?
What was the calculated free energy of H2 binding in the cluster model?
